variable.name: ESP_ID
variable.description: De-identified subject ID

variable.name: ESP_COHORT
variable.description: ESP, cohort [lung health study: LHS]

variable.name: ESP_RACE
variable.description: ESP, race [European American]

variable.name: ESP_SEX
variable.description: ESP, sex [male or female]

variable.name: ESP_STUDY_SITE
variable.description: ESP, study site [Baltimore, Birmingham, Cleveland, Detroit, Los Angeles, Pittsburgh, Portland, Rochester, Salt Lake City, Winnipeg]

variable.name: ESP_MI_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, MI status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_T2DIABETES
variable.description: ESP, Type 2 diabetes status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_BMI
variable.description: ESP, Baseline BMI in kg/m2

variable.name: ESP_AGE_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, age baseline

variable.name: ESP_HEIGHT_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, standing height in inches at baseline

variable.name: ESP_WEIGHT_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, weight in lbs. at baseline

variable.name: ESP_CURRENT_SMOKER_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, current smoking status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_FORMER_SMOKER_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, former smoking status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_CURRENT_ALCOHOL_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, current alcohol drinker status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_SBP_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, systolic blood pressure at baseline (avg. of 2 measurements), in mm Hg

variable.name: ESP_DBP_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, diastolic blood pressure at baseline (avg. of 2 measurements), in mm Hg

variable.name: ESP_STROKE_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, stroke status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_HEARTFAILURE_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, heart failure at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_ASTHMA_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, asthma status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_COPD_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_ANGIOPLASTY_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, angioplasty status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_CABG_BASELINE
variable.description: ESP, coronary artery bypass status at baseline (0/1)
